pages.text: This augment can only be added to the $(l:modules/extruder_2)Extruder Module Mk2/$.$(p)When present, any fake blocks extruded by the module take on the properties of the faked block, e.g. $(item)Obsidian/$ is hard to break, $(item)Glowstone/$ emits light, and $(item)Redstone Blocks/$ emit a redstone signal.
